Title: Derive new insights for your SQL database in Fabric w/ enhanced performance dashboard | Data Exposed
Description:
Managing the performance of your SQL database in Fabric just got smarter! Explore the new memory consumption feature and learn how to keep your workloads running at peak efficiency.
